level_rune_10-01.name: Grand Knight Territory Bar District
level_rune_10-01.description:
Late-night Kazimierz sees drunken knights wandering all over, but outnumbering them are the Armorless Union hidden in the shadows... and certain fanatical imitators of the knights.
<@lv.item><City Neon></>Provides an initial amount of visibility, and can further increase visibility when used
<@lv.item><Knight Crest></>When used, permanently provides visibility over a certain tile

global_lifepoint_1.description: Max Life Points are reduced to 1

enemy_aruarw_1.description: All <Armorless Union Crossbowmen> have +50% HP, +40% ATK, and +30 RES.

char_cost_snipercaster_1.description: The DP Cost of Sniper and Caster Operators is doubled

char_cost_guardspecial_1.description: The DP Cost of Guard and Specialist Operators is doubled.

char_hp_1.description: All friendly units have -20% Max HP.

global_costrecovery_1.description: Natural DP regeneration rate is reduced by 25%

enemy_atk_attackspeed_1.description: All enemies gain +15% ATK and +15 ASPD.

enemy_cadkgt_1.description: <The Candle Knight Viviana> gains +50% HP; <Glimmering Touch> has half the charge time.

enemy_nmekgt_1.description: <'The Last Kheshig', Tola> gains +50% HP, +20% ATK, +20% DEF, and +10 RES.

global_pcharnum_1.description: Deployed Unit Limit is reduced to 7

global_squadnum_1.description: Max Squad size is reduced to 10 Operators

token_neonlamp_candle_amod_1.description: The <City Neons> in the upper and upper right parts of the battlefield will no longer appear; The number of <Knight Crests> is reduced by 3.

token_neonlamp_candle_bmod_1.description: The <City Neons> in the upper and lower right parts of the battlefield will no longer appear; The number of <Knight Crests> is reduced by 3.

char_exclude_snipercaster_2.description: Sniper and Caster Operators cannot be deployed

char_exclude_guardspecial_2.description: Guard and Specialist Operators cannot be deployed.

global_pcharnum_2.description: Deployed Unit Limit is reduced to 5

global_squadnum_2.description: Max Squad size is reduced to 7 Operators

char_hp_2.description: All friendly units have -40% Max HP.

global_costrecovery_2.description: Natural DP regeneration rate is reduced by 50%

enemy_atk_attackspeed_2.description: All enemies gain +30% ATK and +30 ASPD.

enemy_cadkgt_amod_2.description: <The Candle Knight Viviana> gains +110% HP and is less likely to be targeted by friendly units; <Glimmering Touch> has half the charge time and -40% cooldown.

enemy_cadkgt_bmod_2.description: <The Candle Knight Viviana> gains +80% HP, +50% ATK, and increased attack range; Attacks ignore 35% of the target's RES; <Glimmering Touch> has half the charge time.

enemy_nmekgt_amod_2.description: <'The Last Kheshig', Tola> gains +100% HP, +60% ATK, and +30 RES and enters the battlefield sooner.

enemy_nmekgt_bmod_2.description: <'The Last Kheshig', Tola> gains +65% HP, +80% ATK, and +60% DEF; <Nightzmora Follower> will appear.

enemy_cadkgt_amod_3.description: <The Candle Knight Viviana> gains +160% HP and is less likely to be targeted by friendly units; <Glimmering Touch> is cast instantly and has -70% cooldown.

enemy_cadkgt_bmod_3.description: <The Candle Knight Viviana> gains +110% HP, +90% ATK, and increased attack range; Attacks ignore 80% of the target's RES; <Glimmering Touch> has half the charge time.

enemy_nmekgt_amod_3.description: <'The Last Kheshig', Tola> gains +150% HP, +100% ATK, and +50 RES, enters the battlefield sooner, and is invisible.

enemy_nmekgt_bmod_3.description: <'The Last Kheshig', Tola> gains 80% HP, +150% ATK, and +100% DEF; Large numbers of <Nightzmora Follower> will appear.

enemy_aruass_1.description: All <Armorless Union Assassins> have +100% HP, and when in areas with <no visibility>, the speeds at which ATK increases and the maximum ATK are increased by 100%.

char_cost_tokentrap_1.description: The DP Cost and Use Cost of Summoned units and stage devices are tripled.

token_neonlamp_candle_2.description: All <City Neons> will no longer appear; The number of <Knight Crests> is reduced by 2.

enemy_napkgt_2.description: Even more <Knight Territory Hibernators> will appear.

enemy_atk_attackspeed_3.description: All enemies gain +45% ATK and +45 ASPD.

char_hp_3.description: All friendly units have -60% Max HP
